name: Legend of Gertrude
description:
Welcome to Legend of Gertrude.

A game in which you own a sword with a strange power. It sticks to everything it attacks.

Controls: Move: WASD (or ZQSD)
Left Attack: Left Mouse button
Right Attack: Right Mouse button
Spin Attack: Hold Spacebar

Credits:

This game was made by four French developers for the #GMTKJam in 48h

Theme : Joined Together

Additional free 3D assets :
LOWPOLY : https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/16677
BROKEN VECTOR : https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/12124
MESHTINT STUDIO : https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/3867
INNOVANA GAMES : https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/43453
